com.caverock.androidsvg

Class SVGAndroidWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.caverock.androidsvg.SVGAndroidWriter

  • public class SVGAndroidWriter
extends java.lang.Object
    The writer part of AndroidSVG.

    All interaction with AndroidSVG is via the SVG class. You may ignore this class.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void write(java.io.File file, SVG svg)
      Write the given SVG to the given file
      static void write(java.io.File file, SVG svg, SVG.OutputFormat format)
      Write the given SVG to the given file with given format (JPG, PNG, WEBP, SVG, SVGZ) The default background color for JPEG is white
      static void write(java.io.File file, SVG svg, SVG.OutputFormat format, int backgroundColor)
      Write the given SVG to the given file with given format (JPG, PNG, WEBP, SVG, SVGZ) The background color for JPEG is backgroundColor parameter
      static void write(java.io.OutputStream stream, SVG svg)
      Write the given SVG to the given output stream
      static void write(java.io.OutputStreamWriter writer, SVG svg)
      Write the given SVG to the given output stream writer
